channel.description: Recent content in Projects on barland.net

item.title: AWS Fraud Detection
item.description: Trends Marketplace 2022 MSBA-6330 Group 7: Grant Barland, Huiyan Xiong, Jacob Braun, Jiayi Wang, Ravi Hasyagar, Shuyun Liu Fraud Detection Model and Visualization using AWS SageMaker, AWS QuickSight, and AWS S3 Project Background This project describes how Amazon S3, Amazon SageMaker and Amazon QuickSight can be utilized for Fraud Detection. Why Fraud? Dataset https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/kartik2112/fraud-detection This is a simulated credit card transaction dataset containing legitimate and fraud transactions from the duration 1st Jan 2019 - 31st Dec 2020.

item.title: Cats vs. Dogs Image Classifier
item.description: # Tools import pandas as pd from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np import math import os # ML import tensorflow as tf from keras.models import Sequential from keras.layers import Dense from keras import losses from keras.callbacks import EarlyStopping from keras.layers import BatchNormalization import random import cv2 from tensorflow import keras from keras.models import Sequential from keras.layers import Input, Dropout, Flatten, Conv2D, MaxPool2D, Dense, Activation from keras.
